topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
A critical security flaw in React Server Components, identified as CVE-2025-55182, is being actively exploited by threat actors to drain wallets and deploy malware across the crypto industry and all websites using React. Security Alliance urges immediate review of front-end code.
Sources:
- https://cryptonews.com/news/major-javascript-library-breach-puts-all-crypto-websites-at-risk

eventSummary:

Sources:
- https://cryptopanic.com/news/27955098/DeFi-News-Hackers-Exploit-React-Vulnerability-to-Inject-Crypto-Wallet-Drainers-Security-Groups-Warn

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
North Korean cybercriminals are using 'fake Zoom' tactics to install malware, stealing victims' sensitive data, including passwords and private keys. Cybersecurity firm Security Alliance (SEAL) warned that it has been tracking "multiple daily" such attempts.
Sources:
- https://cryptonews.com/news/north-korean-actors-use-fake-zoom-to-drain-crypto-wallets-300m-stolen-already
